thread.section_title: Who is Yolande Trueman? Her story so far as she returns to EastEnders – Metro
thread.title: Who is Yolande Trueman? Her story so far as she returns to EastEnders
thread.title_full: Who is Yolande Trueman? Her story so far as she returns to EastEnders

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Who is Yolande Trueman? Her story so far as she returns to EastEnders
text:
(Picture: BBC) It’s been almost a decade since we last saw her in EastEnders, but many fans still hold a fondness for Yolande Trueman, the wife of Patrick whom many have called on to return over the years. 
As Angela Wynter reprises her role as the no-nonsense Minute Mart executive for a cameo which sees her try and go easy on Denise Fox at her disciplinary, let’s take a look at the character’s story so far – from her arrival under producer Louise Berridge in 2003 through to her last appearance (until now) in 2008.
Yolande was introduced as a holiday romance for Patrick when he went abroad and the thrill of the affair was much different to what Yolande was used to in her strict life with her deeply religious husband Victor, who treated women as objects.
(Picture: BBC) When Yolande returned to Walford with Patrick, she began to fear that he had been only after a fling and contemplated returning home to Trinidad but changed her mind when Patrick convinced her that he loved her.
When Victor arrived and offered Patrick £10,000 to finish with Yolande, she thought he had accepted and went home with her husband, leaving Patrick crushed. However, she later returned and divided the money with Patrick, whom she settled down with and married in 2004.
They ran the B&B together and even fostered a young girl for some time and later ran the Minute Mart together.
However, things would come undone for Patrick and Yolande when Patrick was tempted into a fling with Pat Evans in 2006. When Stacey caught them together, Yolande was devastated and she ended up dishing out a whopper of a slap to Pat.
(Picture: BBC) Deciding to get her own back on Patrick, she headed to a nightclub to pick up a man for a one night stand but found that she couldn’t go through with it.
Yolande forgave Patrick but he threw her out when he suspected that she had slept with his friend Aubrey. When Aubrey came clean that nothing happened, Patrick and Yolande reconciled again.

In 2008, Yolande’s exit story unfolded as Patrick caused food poisoning by selling food not properly chilled from the Minute Mart. Head Office were so impressed with Yolande’s methods of dealing with the crisis that they offered her a promotion that would take her to Birmingham.
Yolande accepted but Patrick wasn’t keen on the move so Yolande left alone, with Patrick promising to follow her. As fans know, he didn’t end up going and received his divorce papers in 2009.
(Picture: BBC) Yolande has recently been mentioned a lot as Denise has been called for a disciplinary at the Minute Mart HQ – with Yolande reappearing to chair the meeting and give Denise a fighting chance – and she is a fierce and fair as we remember her.
(Picture: BBC) But could she return again – and, if so, how would Patrick react to seeing his ex again?
